item.title: D claws help
item.dc:creator: @Gh0st_Jr Gh0st Jr
item.description:
@Gh0st_Jr wrote:

oi.
Dclaws

ok, so yours is probably non-renamed so:

if(i == 14484) // item id { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 13698; class8.anInt181 = 738; // zoom; increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 245; // model rotate; up+down increase to move down away from you class8.anInt198 = 80; // model rotate; side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -2; // model offset; increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 3; // model offset; increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 13699; class8.anInt200 = 13699; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon claws"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A set of fighting claws.".getBytes(); }

and to your client download these:
Equip model: http://www.mediafire.com/?vzgwzjkrwmz
Drop model: http://www.mediafire.com/?z0wjlmdizzq

and then copy them to your “models” in your client files
then compile and it depends on what client your using, but you need to do something like type into your chat box
“add models” or
something like “add model (model ID)”

[size=15pt]100% creds to Galkon for claws.[/size]

Read full topic
